data.comment: The match has started.
Diego Montano Robles awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 3, Diego Montano Robles signals a Pumas UNAM throw-in in Monterrey's half.
Pumas UNAM awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Pumas UNAM have a goal kick.
In the minute 7, Favio Alvarez (Pumas UNAM) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Pumas UNAM have been awarded a corner by Diego Montano Robles.
Pumas UNAM drive upfield and Alan Mozo gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Monterrey defender.
In the minute 8, Corner awarded to Pumas UNAM.
Throw-in for Monterrey in their own half.
Ball safe as Monterrey is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 10, Throw-in for Pumas UNAM in the half of Monterrey.
Dorlan Pabon of Monterrey gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for Pumas UNAM at Estadio Olimpico Universitario.
In the minute 12, It's a goal kick for the away team in Mexico City.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Pumas UNAM pushes forward through Carlos Gonzalez, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 14, Throw-in Monterrey.
Pumas UNAM needs to be cautious. Monterrey have an attacking throw-in.
Matias Kranevitter for Monterrey is whistled offside.
In the minute 16, Diego Montano Robles awards Pumas UNAM a goal kick.
Throw-in for Pumas UNAM at Estadio Olimpico Universitario.
Can Pumas UNAM get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Monterrey's half?
In the minute 17, Throw-in for Pumas UNAM in their own half.
In Mexico City Pumas UNAM attack through Carlos Gonzalez. The finish is off target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Monterrey goal kick.
In the minute 19, In Mexico City a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Monterrey to take a throw-in in Pumas UNAM territory.
Can Monterrey get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Pumas UNAM's half?
In the minute 20, Diego Montano Robles signals a Pumas UNAM throw-in in Monterrey's half.
Free kick for Monterrey in their own half.
Diego Montano Robles awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 23, Monterrey are pushing forward but Stefan Medina's finish is wide of the goal.
Diego Montano Robles awards Pumas UNAM a goal kick.
Jero Rodriguez (Pumas UNAM) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 24, Pumas UNAM have been awarded a corner by Diego Montano Robles.
Nicolas Freire (Pumas UNAM) strikes at Estadio Olimpico Universitario but his header is cleared.
Throw-in for Pumas UNAM at Estadio Olimpico Universitario.
In the minute 26, Monterrey awarded a free kick in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Mexico City.
Free kick for Pumas UNAM in the half of Monterrey.
In the minute 29, Monterrey's Stefan Medina gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Pumas UNAM defender.
Corner awarded to Monterrey.
Pumas UNAM awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 32, Monterrey's Rogelio Funes Mori misses with an attempt on goal.
Goal kick for Pumas UNAM at Estadio Olimpico Universitario.
Throw-in Monterrey.
In the minute 33, Pumas UNAM to take a throw-in in Monterrey territory.
Monterrey drives forward and Maximiliano Meza gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Monterrey have been awarded a corner by Diego Montano Robles.
In the minute 36, Ball goes out of play for a Pumas UNAM goal kick.
Pumas UNAM have a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Pumas UNAM.
In the minute 38, Diego Montano Robles signals a free kick to Monterrey in their own half.
Ball safe as Monterrey is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Pumas UNAM are coming forward and Favio Alvarez gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 39, Ball goes out of play for a Monterrey goal kick.
Pumas UNAM's Carlos Gonzalez gets in a shot on goal at Estadio Olimpico Universitario. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Maximiliano Meza of Monterrey smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 41, Pumas UNAM have been awarded a corner by Diego Montano Robles.
Throw-in for Pumas UNAM in the half of Monterrey.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 42, An attacking Pumas UNAM player has been brought down in the area - penalty!
Goal! Pumas UNAM take a 1-0 lead thanks to a Juan Dinenno spot-kick..
Free kick Monterrey.
In the minute 45, The fourth official's board shows 1 minutes, which will be added to the 1st half.
Monterrey to take a throw-in in Pumas UNAM territory.
In the minute 45, Diego Montano Robles signals a free kick to Monterrey.
Monterrey's Maximiliano Meza has run offside.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
Dorlan Pabon (Monterrey) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 46, The second-half has started.
Monterrey awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Vincent Janssen is replacing Miguel Layun for Monterrey at Estadio Olimpico Universitario.
In the minute 47, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Pumas UNAM close to the penalty box.
Corner awarded to Pumas UNAM.
In the minute 49, Diego Montano Robles awards Pumas UNAM a goal kick.
Can Monterrey get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Pumas UNAM's half?
Monterrey have been awarded a corner by Diego Montano Robles.
In the minute 51, Diego Montano Robles awards the home team a throw-in.
In Mexico City, Rogelio Funes Mori of Monterrey is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Monterrey awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 53, Free kick for Monterrey in the half of Pumas UNAM.
Amaury Garcia Moreno is booked for the home team.
Throw-in Monterrey.
Diego Montano Robles signals a Pumas UNAM throw-in in Monterrey's half.
Ball safe as Monterrey is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 55, Diego Montano Robles signals a free kick to Monterrey in their own half.
In the minute 55, Johan Vasquez is on a sub for Jero Rodriguez for Pumas UNAM.
Important block from the Pumas UNAM defence as Rogelio Funes Mori fires in a strike for Monterrey.
Goal kick for Pumas UNAM at Estadio Olimpico Universitario.
In the minute 57, Free kick for Pumas UNAM in their own half.
Amaury Garcia Moreno for Pumas UNAM gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Monterrey have a goal kick.
In the minute 59, Monterrey have been given a penalty...
Diego Montano Robles signals a free kick to Monterrey.
Goal! The away team are now level through a Nicolas Sanchez penalty.
In the minute 62, Alfredo Talavera (Pumas UNAM) gets a yellow card.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Mexico City.
Throw-in for Pumas UNAM in the half of Monterrey.
In the minute 64, The away team have replaced Maximiliano Meza with Celso Ortiz. This is the first substitution made today by Antonio Mohamed.
Ball goes out of play for a Pumas UNAM goal kick.
Free kick Monterrey.
In the minute 66, At Estadio Olimpico Universitario, Nicolas Freire has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Free kick for Pumas UNAM in their own half.
In the minute 68, Corner awarded to Monterrey.
Andres Lillini (Pumas UNAM) is making a second substitution, with Juan Iturbe replacing Amaury Garcia Moreno.
Matias Kranevitter of Monterrey is pulled up for offside.
Pumas UNAM's Carlos Gonzalez breaks free at Estadio Olimpico Universitario. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 69, It's a goal kick for the away team in Mexico City.
Pumas UNAM have a goal kick.
Johan Vasquez (Pumas UNAM) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Throw-in for Monterrey at Estadio Olimpico Universitario.
In the minute 72, Vincent Janssen (Monterrey) has received a yellow card from Diego Montano Robles.
In the minute 73, Throw-in for Monterrey in their own half.
Monterrey make their third substitution with Arturo Gonzalez replacing Dorlan Pabon.
Throw-in for Pumas UNAM close to the penalty box.
Goal kick for Monterrey at Estadio Olimpico Universitario.
In the minute 77, Can Monterrey get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Pumas UNAM's half?
Diego Montano Robles signals a free kick to Pumas UNAM in their own half.
Throw-in Monterrey.
In the minute 78, Throw-in for Pumas UNAM in the half of Monterrey.
Throw-in for Pumas UNAM in their own half.
Corner awarded to Monterrey.
In the minute 81, In Mexico City, Nicolas Sanchez (Monterrey) misses the target with a header.
Diego Montano Robles awards Pumas UNAM a goal kick.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 84, Juan Dinenno (Pumas UNAM) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Pumas UNAM have been awarded a corner by Diego Montano Robles.
Ball goes out of play for a Monterrey goal kick.
In the minute 85, Erik Lira is replacing Favio Alvarez for the home team.
The home team replace Alan Mozo with Jesus Rivas.
Monterrey's Rogelio Funes Mori is whistled for offside at Estadio Olimpico Universitario.
In the minute 86, Pumas UNAM's Carlos Gutierrez gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Diego Montano Robles awards Monterrey a goal kick.
Goal kick for Monterrey at Estadio Olimpico Universitario.
In the minute 88, Pumas UNAM awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball safe as Monterrey is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Pumas UNAM awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Pumas UNAM to take a throw-in in Monterrey territory.
In Mexico City a free kick has been awarded the home team.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 4 minutes of added time.
Pumas UNAM push forward at Estadio Olimpico Universitario and Carlos Gonzalez gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Monterrey defence.
Pumas UNAM have been awarded a corner by Diego Montano Robles.
Monterrey have a goal kick.
That's full-time at Estadio Olimpico Universitario. The final score is 1-1.
Antonio Mohamed is making the team's fourth substitution at Estadio Olimpico Universitario with Jose Alvarado replacing Rogelio Funes Mori.
The away team replace Carlos Rodriguez with Jonathan Gonzalez.
Stefan Medina for Monterrey has been booked by Diego Montano Robles and receives a first yellow card.
